attributes.action: Stop the environmental minister from allowing water companies powers to impose compulsory water meters at homes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The environmental minister is giving powers to water companies so they can enforse compulsory water meters at thousands of homes. 
As a result the cost of water will increase significantly and this will have a severe financial impact on poor people who can't afford the huge increses in rates. 
This petition calls on the Prime Minister to ensure that the environmental minister only gives out powers to water companies that will not increase the waters bills of their customers.
